mapper.insert: insert into CS(chargeName, operation, chargeSpeed, postcode, roadAddress, detailAddress, extraAddress, image1 ,image2, cable, chargeType) values( #{chargeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extraAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
